item.title: LaTeX Personalization
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: In the last article we talked about the bare-minimum LaTeX that you need to know to get started.

item.title: Bare-minimum LaTex
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: In this article I encourage you to start off learning LaTex by covering only the very basics, the bare-minimum.

item.title: LaTex for Everyone
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: As a student, or really anyone that has to take a lot of notes and documentation on a daily basis, we come across many hurdles to cross.
